name: Xmas tree (itch)
description: Xmas tree for those who are always in a hurry! This little tree is always on the go, but its lights are constantly going out. As a result, your home will be filled with the festive spirit of Christmas, but without the hassle of having to constantly stop and replace burnt out light bulbs. Luckily, you can help the Xmas tree not fall into the crusher before the new year.
